clients.name: BMPM

monitoring_thresholds.comment: B2B promotional merchandise under Clear Prospects. CRISIS: 0.10x ROAS Sep, 0.00x Oct, restructuring

clients.notes: Part of Clear Prospects multi-brand. B2B branded merchandise. Website: https://bmpm.trade/. CRITICAL: Restructuring for profitability. Paused underperforming categories (mugs, coasters, napkins) early Oct. New search campaign Oct 21 (cushions). Very low/no ROAS - needs close monitoring.

clients.name: Grain Guard

monitoring_thresholds.comment: Agricultural/grain storage products. Strong performance: 160% ROAS H&S, 140% ROAS Villains

clients.notes: Grain storage and pest control. Manager ID 2569949686 required for API access. Two product lines: H&S (Heroes & Sidekicks) performing at 160% ROAS, Villains at 140% ROAS. Switched H&S to Shopping Only on Sept 11, 2025. Seasonal business (harvest Aug-Oct).

clients.name: Crowd Control

monitoring_thresholds.comment: Safety/crowd control equipment. Three product lines at 170% ROAS (Heroes, Villains, Zombies)

clients.notes: Crowd control barriers and safety equipment. Also called 'CCC UK'. Three themed product categories: Heroes & Sidekicks, Villains, Zombies. All campaigns converged to 170% ROAS target on Oct 14, 2025 (was previously 180-210%). Active optimization with frequent ROAS adjustments.
